DOC.detailed_description: - Participant eligibility study include gestational age 34 42 week , live fetus , cephalic presentation , active phase labour well-establish uterine contraction ( 3 contraction within 10 min ) cervical dilatation 3 5 cm partially efface cervix ( % 70 ) . - Exclusion criterion placenta previa , placental abruption , caesarean section uterine scarring , abnormal placentation ( accreta , increta , percreta ) , multiple gestation , fetal macrosomia ( ≥4000 g ) , suspicious cephalopelvic disproportion , meperidine allergy , use kind labour induction augmentation admission delivery hospital . - A Simple randomisation use random-number table perform investigational pharmacy staff , take part study . - The primary outcome interest study labor duration .
DOC.criteria: gestational age 34 42 week live fetus cephalic presentation active phase labour placenta previa , placental abruption caesarean section uterine scar multiple gestation fetal macrosomia ( ≥4000 g ) meperidine allergy use kind labour induction augmentation admission delivery hospital
